title: WTB: Minor league T206 Minneapolis, St Paul and Montreal
author: silvor

posts.post_title: WTB: Minor league T206 Minneapolis, St Paul and Montreal
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following graded (PSA or SCG) T206 minor league cards.  I would like in the 3-5 grade range, but could be talked into something better or worse.  May consider raw cards if you have a bunch of them. 

Let me know your price.

Minneapolis Millers
Collins
Downs, Jerry
Oberlin
O'Neil, William J.
Quillen
Young, Irv

St Paul Saints
Armbruster
O'Brien, Peter

Montreal Royals
Casey, Doc

I have a Pickering SGC 50.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url] if you are interested.  Bill
